Her colon cancer that defied surgery, chemo, and radiation is within remission."In the last five years I've had four surgeries to remove growths, and since I've been on combretastatin I have not had any new progress," Gordon says.Along with Gordon's promising story, there exists mounting evidence in which combretastatin has tumor-fighting potential.
